concept.title: Data Collector Configuration
concept.shortdesc: You can edit the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties, to configure properties such as the host name and port number and account information for email alerts.

conbody.p: You can store sensitive information in separate files and reference them in the configuration file. You can also reference information in an environment variable.

You can define runtime properties in the configuration file or in a separate file. For more information, see . When you use Cloudera Manager to install , you must use Cloudera Manager to configure properties and environment. Manual changes to the properties or environment files are not recognized by Cloudera Manager. For more information, see .
